highlights: Developed Vue.js frontend and Nest.js backend for enterprise scale video conference platform
Improved and extended WebSocket pipeline to push subscriber updates from Redis to the frontend
Implemented recording service and corresponding Terraform infrastructure to configure and deploy s3 bucket for recordings
Led the development of regression testing scripts in cypress and webdriver
Developed database schema and migrations using TypeOrm and PostgreSQL
Implemented new checkout process for brokers/agents to automate market listings with facebook lead ads
Worked extensively with Facebook Graph API and Marketing API via PHP SDK
Refactored Simply Home dashboard UI by extending and creating data-driven react components
Assisted high school and college students raise their grades and get caught up with their peers
Built fundamental confidence with the use of leading questions tailored to the student's learning style
Created custom homework assignments that inspired independent learning

projects.name: Othello
projects.description: A passion project to recreate one of my favorite ancient board games. I developed my version of Othello utilizing a javascript stack (React/Redux/Node/Express) with a MySQL database. This project has challenged me to make difficult design decisions and learn from my mistakes constantly. The most helpful concept I have learned from this project is the value of unit testing. I also have learned how to write much cleaner and more modular code by utilizing linting tools.
